products.name: Chocolate Fudge Cake
products.description: Rich, moist chocolate cake layered with decadent fudge frosting. Perfect for chocolate lovers and special celebrations.

products.name: Vanilla Bean Celebration Cake
products.description: Light and fluffy vanilla cake with real vanilla bean specks, layered with smooth buttercream frosting.

products.name: Red Velvet Dream
products.description: Classic red velvet cake with a hint of cocoa, topped with cream cheese frosting and elegant decorations.

newProduct.name: Strawberry Shortcake
newProduct.description: Light and fluffy cake with fresh strawberries and whipped cream
newProduct.details: Our strawberry shortcake features layers of vanilla sponge cake, fresh strawberries, and whipped cream. Perfect for summer celebrations!
newProduct.ingredients: Flour, sugar, eggs, butter, vanilla extract, strawberries, heavy cream, baking powder, salt
